Tucson coils his tail up to be sure it doesn't trip anyone walking by.  Yet=
 not asleep, he raises his neck with a heavy sigh.  He felt that somehow, h=
e let everyone down. He tries to put his front talons on the bed and his ba=
ck ones as well, trying to lift his body up but to no avail. He was too wea=
k to move and it leaves him frustrated.  He sets himself down with a dracon=
ic groan.

" I wish recharging did not take this long.  They need me out th=
ere."

Straight Shot looks to him while sitting up on her hind legs.

" But=
 we need you ALIVE.  Don't feel guilty for something ya can't help.  Ya got=
ta start thinking about yourself too, you don't do much of that, Tucson.  Y=
ou have a bright future ahead of ya with Talon and you could have a family =
down the road.  Just think how wonderful that will be, a family ta call you=
r own, a life you helped ta bring into this world.  Please, don't throw tha=
t away."

Tucson smiles and nods to her.

"  I won't I promise".

Meanwhile=
 Nightshift grins at Wing Caliber.

" mind if we trade this for a can of en=
ergon?"

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.

n with her eye "Where is he?"
